item.title: Samiah Downing’s tragic story at just 4 years old.
item.description: The story of Samiah Downing, whose life was cut short at just 4 years old, and the lasting impact on those who knew and loved her.

media:content.media:title: Samiah Downing’s tragic story at just 4 years old.
media:content.media:description: The story of Samiah Downing, whose life was cut short at just 4 years old, and the lasting impact on those who knew and loved her.

item.title: Teen Girl Hanged and Betrayed
item.description: The story of a teenager whose death revealed a painful betrayal, and the investigation that uncovered what happened.

item.title: Did Sleepwalking Lead to His Wife's Death?
item.description: Exploring a case where the defense claims a man’s sleepwalking may have been a factor in the circumstances surrounding his wife’s death.

item.title: Her Killer’s Name Found Written on Her Body
item.description: Investigators discover a name written on the victim’s body, a detail that becomes central in identifying a suspect and advancing the case.

item.title: The True Story That Inspired "Jeepers Creepers"
item.description: Explore the true events that inspired the horror film "Jeepers Creepers," blending folklore and real-life mystery in a captivating tale.

item.title: Becky Stowe: The Disappearance and an Unexpected Suspect ��
item.description: Explore the disappearance of Becky Stowe and how an unexpected suspect became central to the ongoing investigation.

item.title: Police Informant Turned Notorious Criminal: Scott Kimball
item.description: The story of Scott Kimball, once a police informant who later became known for criminal activities, revealing a complex and troubling case.

item.title: He Wrote "Mom" and "Dad" on the Shotgun Shells
item.description: A boy inscribed “Mom” and “Dad” on shotgun shells, sparking questions about the meaning behind this unusual act.

item.title: Love, Lies and Betrayal: The Murder of Claudette Fici
item.description: In 1994, 19-year-old Claudette Ficik vanished in Georgia. Her body was found weighted and submerged—she was four months pregnant. Her boyfriend later pleaded guilty, leaving many questions unanswered.

item.title: Cold Case Cracked: The Case of Mandy Stavik
item.description: In 1989, 18-year-old Mandy Stavik vanished while jogging in rural Washington. Her murder remained unsolved until 2017, when DNA from a coworker‑collected cup led to Timothy Bass’s arrest and conviction.

item.title: ‘I Think I Almost Got Kidnapped’: The April Millsap Case
item.description: On July 24, 2014, 14-year-old April Millsap texted her boyfriend she’d “almost got kidnapped.” Hours later she was found assaulted and killed on a Michigan trail. Digital data and phone tracking helped convict her killer.

item.title: Cheerleader Killed a Week Before Graduation
item.description: 18‑year‑old Olivia Flores died in May 2024 after a state trooper’s cruiser collided with her vehicle in Minnesota. The trooper now faces vehicular homicide charges.

item.title: One of the Year's Most Gruesome Cases
item.description: This case stood out as one of the most talked-about of the year, drawing attention for its complexity and the investigation that followed.

item.title: 6 Lives Lost at a Sleepover by a Known Offender: The Henryetta Tragedy
item.description: On May 1, 2023, convicted sex offender Jesse McFadden murdered six people—including two teen sleepover guests, a mother, and her three children—before taking his own life in rural Henryetta, Oklahoma.

item.title: Trusted friends betrayed Cassie Jo
item.description: In 2006, 16‑year‑old Cassie Jo Stoddart was brutally killed by two classmates she trusted. A videotaped plot inspired by horror films and DNA evidence brought justice.

item.title: Her daughter stands by him screaming for him to stop
item.description: John Battaglia, a Texas father, shot and killed his two young daughters in 2001. The girls pleaded with him to stop, but he carried out the killings before being convicted and executed.

item.title: Teen Girl Hanged and Betrayed
item.description: Teen Girl Hanged and Betrayed

item.title: Did Sleepwalking Lead to His Wife's Death?
item.description: Deep dive into this strange sleepwalking case.

item.title: Teen shot and killed while walking home
item.description: 13-year-old Lauren Landavazo was fatally shot in 2016 while walking home from school with her friend in Wichita Falls. The shooter, Kody Lott, was convicted and sentenced to life.

item.title: Her Killer’s Name Found Written on Her Body
item.description: Her Killer’s Name Found Written on Her Body
